page.title: 05THE ATHLETICS FIELD/REETH
page.content:
The Athletics field is 3 acres ,and it has a pavillion.There is a river near the pitch just over the wall.The pavillion cost thousands of pounds to build.We have to keep it in good condition.Inside the pavillion there is a sink and carpets and two separate changing rooms and proper seats.It is going to have a toilet.Itwas built in 1983.On the field we play Football and Cricket.Reeth has an under 12s and under 16s and a mens team.We also have a mens cricket team.Reeth under 12s wear red with white pin stripes and they play teams from Wensleydale. Reeth men play the Wensleydale teams aswell.
_
